gen:link.msg:message: `IncomeOther` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_IncomeOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeOtherCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeOtherCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeOtherDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfIncomeOtherDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncomeParentalContributions` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `hbo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_IncomeParentalContributions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA2_IncomeParentalContributions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncomeParentalContributions` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `wo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_IncomeParentalContributions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA1_IncomeParentalContributions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`IncomeStudentContributions` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `po`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_IncomeStudentContributions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesIncomeOtherBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovA6_IncomeStudentContributions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
